supportedProperty.title: isDefault
supportedProperty.description:
It's important to keep the getter for isDefault property,
otherwise Api Platform will be not able to get the value in the response,
in other words don't rename by IsDefault().

supportedProperty.title: entityTypes
supportedProperty.description: Get entity types for which reindexing should occur.

supportedProperty.title: indexNames
supportedProperty.description: Get the list of index names created so far by the self-reindex.
